text: Fully Formed Entertainment is an American film production company started in 2018 by Brad Fuller and Andrew Form, who also co-founded Platinum Dunes with Michael Bay. == History == Fully Formed Entertainment made its origins in 2018 when they signed a three-year, first-look non-exclusive deal with Paramount Pictures to produce its feature films, coming off the success of A Quiet Place. On November 22, 2019, they hired Alex Ginno as the head of the film department of the company. == Filmography == {| class="wikitable sortable" !Year !Film !Director !Distributor(s) !References !Budget !Gross !Rotten Tomatoes |- |TBA |Untitled fast car project |Chad Stahelski |Paramount Pictures | | | | |} == References == Category:Companies based in Los Angeles Category:American companies established in 2018 Category:Film production companies of the United States Category:2018 establishments in California Category:Mass media companies established in 2018
title: Fully Formed Entertainment
